I have had this choker for about two years, maybe three and its still in great condition!

The non-metal is high quality. I removed the chains and rebuilt it into a pull-choker. Works well but the links are aluminum so they can't take too much tension. If they were stainless, it would've been 5-star. But if you're keeping it as-is, aluminum is fine and there's no nickel.

This necklace is very sexy and can be used in a variety of settings. If you want to wear it for a night on the town and give yourself a little “edge” it’s perfect. If you choose to use it in other settings, it’s very impactful. I highly recommend!

类型: Color: black belt with black chains
评论详情: I love this choker. It’s not fabulous quality, but I think it is good for the price point. Definitely a step above Hot Topic or Spencer’s, but still in the general ball park.  The only other thing to mention is just my own personal experience and definitely depends on the individual / how it is worn. I personally have a quite small neck and the last notch on the belt-like clasp was just barely tight enough for me to wear this and have it taut at the base of my neck. I personally ended up cutting part of the end with the holes so I didn’t have such a large portion hanging off to the side. You could definitely add another hole or two virtually anywhere on that end of the choker, so I personally don’t find it to be a big deal, but just something to be aware of if you have a tiny neck like me lol.
The pictures made it look to be a real nice item but upon receipt it is very cheaply made.
